title: Calc effect of Maria's deposit at ABC Bank

content.question: <math alttext="A B C" overflow="scroll"><mtext>ABC</mtext></math> Bank is a commercial bank in Country <math alttext="X" overflow="scroll"><mstyle mathvariant="normal"><mrow><mi>X</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>.
